mapper.update: update d_drug set drugid=drugid ,drugkindid=#{drugkindid} ,brand=#{brand} ,drugspec=#{drugspec} ,packunit=#{packunit} ,unitqty=#{unitqty} ,barcode=#{barcode} ,recycleflag=#{recycleflag} ,picpath=#{picpath} ,remark=#{remark} where drugid=#{drugid}

update d_drug set drugid=drugid ,drugkindid=#{drugkindid} ,brand=#{brand} ,drugspec=#{drugspec} ,packunit=#{packunit} ,unitqty=#{unitqty} ,barcode=#{barcode} ,recycleflag=#{recycleflag} ,picpath=#{picpath} ,remark=#{remark} ,groupid=#{groupid} ,companyid=#{companyid} ,graindepotid=#{graindepotid} where 1=1 and drugid in (${Where_IdsStr}) and drugid =#{Where_Id} and drugid=#{Where_drugid} and drugkindid=#{Where_drugkindid} and brand=#{Where_brand} and drugspec=#{Where_drugspec} and packunit=#{Where_packunit} and unitqty=#{Where_unitqty} and barcode=#{Where_barcode} and recycleflag=#{Where_recycleflag} and picpath=#{Where_picpath} and remark=#{Where_remark} and groupid=#{Where_groupid} and companyid=#{Where_companyid} and graindepotid=#{Where_graindepotid}
mapper.select: select t.drugid "drugid", t.drugkindid "drugkindid", t.brand "brand", t.drugspec "drugspec", t.packunit "packunit", t.unitqty "unitqty", t.barcode "barcode", t.recycleflag "recycleflag", t.picpath "picpath", t.remark "remark", t.groupid "groupid", t.companyid "companyid", t.graindepotid "graindepotid", ddk.drugkindname "drugkindname", lc.companyname "companyname", lgp.groupname "groupname", lgd.graindepotname "graindepotname" from d_drug t left join d_drugkind ddk on ddk.drugkindid=t.drugkindid left join l_company lc on lc.companyid=t.companyid left join l_group lgp on lgp.groupid=t.groupid left join l_graindepot lgd on lgd.graindepotid=t.graindepotid where drugid=#{drugid}

select t.drugid "drugid", t.drugkindid "drugkindid", t.brand "brand", t.drugspec "drugspec", t.packunit "packunit", t.unitqty "unitqty", t.barcode "barcode", t.recycleflag "recycleflag", t.picpath "picpath", t.remark "remark", t.groupid "groupid", t.companyid "companyid", t.graindepotid "graindepotid" from d_drug t where 1=1 and t.drugid=#{drugid} and t.drugkindid=#{drugkindid} and t.brand=#{brand} and t.drugspec=#{drugspec} and t.packunit=#{packunit} and t.unitqty=#{unitqty} and t.barcode=#{barcode} and t.recycleflag=#{recycleflag} and t.picpath=#{picpath} and t.remark=#{remark} and t.groupid=#{groupid} and t.companyid=#{companyid} and t.graindepotid=#{graindepotid}

select t.drugid "drugid", t.drugkindid "drugkindid", t.brand "brand", t.drugspec "drugspec", t.packunit "packunit", t.unitqty "unitqty", t.barcode "barcode", t.recycleflag "recycleflag", t.picpath "picpath", t.remark "remark", t.groupid "groupid", t.companyid "companyid", t.graindepotid "graindepotid" from d_drug t where 1=1 and t.drugid=#{drugid} and t.drugkindid=#{drugkindid} and t.brand=#{brand} and t.drugspec=#{drugspec} and t.packunit=#{packunit} and t.unitqty=#{unitqty} and t.barcode=#{barcode} and t.recycleflag=#{recycleflag} and t.picpath=#{picpath} and t.remark=#{remark} and t.groupid=#{groupid} and t.companyid=#{companyid} and t.graindepotid=#{graindepotid}
mapper.delete: delete from d_drug where 1=1 and drugid in (${Where_IdsStr}) and drugid =#{Where_Id} and drugid=#{Where_drugid} and drugkindid=#{Where_drugkindid} and brand=#{Where_brand} and drugspec=#{Where_drugspec} and packunit=#{Where_packunit} and unitqty=#{Where_unitqty} and barcode=#{Where_barcode} and recycleflag=#{Where_recycleflag} and picpath=#{Where_picpath} and remark=#{Where_remark} and groupid=#{Where_groupid} and companyid=#{Where_companyid} and graindepotid=#{Where_graindepotid}
mapper.select: select t.drugid "drugid", t.drugkindid "drugkindid", t.brand "brand", t.drugspec "drugspec", t.packunit "packunit", t.unitqty "unitqty", t.barcode "barcode", t.recycleflag "recycleflag", t.picpath "picpath", t.remark "remark", t.groupid "groupid", t.companyid "companyid", t.graindepotid "graindepotid", ddk.drugkindname "drugkindname" from d_drug t left join d_drugkind ddk on ddk.drugkindid=t.drugkindid where 1=1 and t.drugid=#{drugid} and t.drugkindid=#{drugkindid} and t.brand=#{brand} and t.drugspec=#{drugspec} and t.packunit=#{packunit} and t.unitqty=#{unitqty} and t.barcode=#{barcode} and t.recycleflag=#{recycleflag} and t.picpath=#{picpath} and t.remark=#{remark} and t.groupid=#{groupid} and t.companyid=#{companyid} and t.graindepotid=#{graindepotid} and ddk.drugkindid=#{drugkindid}

select count(*) from d_drug t left join d_drugkind ddk on ddk.drugkindid=t.drugkindid where 1=1 and t.drugid=#{drugid} and t.drugid!=#{NoId} and t.drugkindid=#{drugkindid} and t.brand=#{brand} and t.drugspec=#{drugspec} and t.packunit=#{packunit} and t.unitqty=#{unitqty} and t.barcode=#{barcode} and t.recycleflag=#{recycleflag} and t.picpath=#{picpath} and t.remark=#{remark} and t.groupid=#{groupid} and t.companyid=#{companyid} and t.graindepotid=#{graindepotid} and ddk.drugkindid=#{drugkindid}
